actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1920.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1920, to require that vessels, as a condition for engaging in the coastwise trade, be built or rebuilt using only materials of United States origin. Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to waive such requirement under specified circumstances.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1920.
